content:
On this page, you can view users registered with DREM and details about them, including their **Role** and **Status**.

Users’ roles determine which actions they can perform in DREM. During an event, you may want to grant a different role to a user.  For example, a pit crew member who was initially given a **Commentator** role may need an **Admin** role to help with admin tasks. You can change a user’s role by selecting the user and choosing **Change role**.
